This app is a graduation project developed by the Department of Management Information Systems, Tamkang University. The project title is "PantryMate – Your Pantry Companion".
 From analyzing user needs, designing functions and UI, to programming with continuous testing and improvements.
 The app is still under development, so you may encounter incomplete designs, which we will continue to refine.
 Development team:
 陳庭浩 – Lead developer, backend architecture, backend security, AI recipes
 林峰彬 – Expiration notification feature
 廖則宇 - UI design
 王鼎元 – About page, Help page

1. On the Add page, tap the Scan button at the bottom left to open the scan page. You can scan the barcode of ingredients to save their data into the database.\n 2. The AI recipe feature only generates recipes based on ingredients in the database. It does not take finished food into account.\n 3. When using this app, the database uses listeners to synchronize data in real time across multiple devices, supporting add, delete, and update operations.
